name: Tossing Bills in the Club HD - Money Lover
name_original: Tossing Bills in the Club HD - Money Lover
description:
Have you ever tossed bills all over the club? No, really... have you?

It's a fiendishly clever game that's too simple and too easy and too hard and too fun. But what does it all mean?

Just start swiping and watch the club get rained on! Hundreds, then thousands, then millions, then billions, trillions, zillions, then googolplexes, and beyond! But to get that much, you'll have to make some wise investments and build up your passive income stream!

Maybe you'll become a famous dancer.

Maybe you'll start building your own apps.

Maybe you'll harvest a far-away planet full of blue people for its natural resources.

So swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, and swipe your way to the top!

Oh, and don't forget to look under your mattress. That's where you keep all your hard earned assets!

Music 'Rich Girl Start' by Keaton Fitzsimmons is licensed by Creative Commons http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/3.0/legalcode
